data.lyric:
[ti:My Head & My Heart]
[ar:Ava Max]
[al:Heaven & Hell (Deluxe Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]My Head & My Heart - Ava Max
[00:02.22]Lyrics by：Amanda Ava Koci/Henry Walter/Thomas Errikson/Madison Love/Tia Scola/Aleksej Evgenevich Potekhin/Serge Zhukov
[00:04.44]Baby now and then
[00:06.79]I think about me now and who I could have been
[00:10.84]And then I picture all the perfect that we lived
[00:15.02]'Til I cut the strings on your tiny violin
[00:18.44]Oh woah
[00:21.28]My mind's got a m-m-mind of its own
[00:23.29]Right now and it makes me hate me
[00:25.34]I'll explode like a dynamite if I can't decide baby
[00:29.51]My head and my heart are torturing me yeah
[00:33.43]That's my mind in your arms I go to extremes yeah
[00:37.40]When angels tell me "Run" and monsters call it love oh no
[00:41.96]My head and my heart I'm torn in between yeah
[00:45.98]La-la la-la-la
[00:48.07]La-la la-la la-la la
[00:49.91]La-la la-la-la
[00:52.20]La-la la-la la-la la
[00:54.07]La-la la-la-la
[00:56.34]La-la la-la la-la la
[00:58.18]La-la la-la-la
[01:00.39]La-la la-la la-la la
[01:02.31]Tell me yes or no
[01:04.67]Asking the Heaven "Should I stay or should I go"
[01:08.79]You held my hand when I had nothing left to hold
[01:12.31]And now I'm on the road woah
[01:19.26]My mind's got a m-m-mind of its own
[01:21.25]Right now and it makes me hate me
[01:23.14]I'll explode like a dynamite if I can't decide baby
[01:27.42]My head and my heart are torturing me yeah
[01:31.37]That's my mind in your arms I go to extremes yeah
[01:35.21]When angels tell me "Run" and monsters call it love oh no
[01:39.92]My head and my heart I'm torn in between yeah
[01:43.80]La-la la-la-la
[01:46.00]La-la la-la la-la la
[01:47.81]La-la la-la-la
[01:50.17]La-la la-la la-la la
[01:51.96]La-la la-la-la
[01:54.27]La-la la-la la-la la
[01:56.10]La-la la-la-la
[01:58.44]La-la la-la la-la la
[02:00.95]I'm standin' at the crossroads
[02:04.93]Across my heart with X's and O's
[02:09.15]Which way leads to forever
[02:12.80]Woah-oh oh-woah oh oh-woah oh oh-woah oh
[02:15.38]God only knows
[02:17.23]My head and my heart are torturing me yeah
[02:21.06]That's my mind in your arms I go to extremes yeah
[02:24.83]When angels tell me "Run" and monsters call it love oh no
[02:28.73]Call it love
[02:29.52]My head
[02:30.21]My head
[02:30.56]And my heart
[02:31.07]My heart
[02:31.66]I'm torn in between yeah
[02:32.80]Between yeah
[02:33.50]La-la la-la-la
[02:35.68]La-la la-la la-la la
[02:37.47]La-la la-la-la
[02:39.07]Oh
[02:39.82]La-la la-la la-la la
[02:41.69]La-la la-la la-la la
[02:43.06]La-la la-la-la
[02:44.08]La-la la-la la-la la
